name: Merchant Baron
flavor: An accomplished merchant with a large operation under their command.

features.name: Everyone Has a Price - Action
features.desc: Spend a Fear to offer a target a dangerous bargain for something they want or need. If used on a PC, they must make a Presence Reaction Roll (17). On a failure, they must mark 2 Stress or take the deal.

features.name: The Best Muscle Money Can Buy - Action
features.desc: Once per scene, mark a Stress to summon 1d4+1 Tier 1 adversaries, who appear at Far range, to enforce the Baronâ€™s will.
